akn:section.akn:heading: Prohibition of the Terrorism Information and Prevention System

akn:content.akn:p: § 460. Prohibition of the Terrorism Information and Prevention System Any and all activities of the Federal Government to implement the proposed component program of the Citizen Corps known as Operation TIPS (Terrorism Information and Prevention System) are hereby prohibited. (Pub. L. 107–296, title VIII, § 880, Nov. 25, 2002, 116 Stat. 2245.)
